citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:05 pm on
04/07/2016. APHIS ACI contacted the licensee via telephone and it was determined that no one was available to
go on an inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:05 pm on
04/07/2016.  APHIS ACI contacted the licensee via telephone and it was determined that no one was available to
go on an inspection.
